Room.Name: Sunshine River Valley
Room.ShortDescription: You have entered a suprisingly cold river valley, yet the sun shines.
Room.LongDescription: The ground is almost frighteningly cold and barren. Everything you can see lies frozen under a bright sun. Although the sun shines brilliantly, you are overcome with cold, and a chill passes through your body. As you look closely at the ground around you, you find evidence of the creatures who roam this area. There are large footprints pressed into the frozen ground. Then you hear them.
